body_html: @lukeiwanski SYCL seems like the right way to go given the amount of template metaprogramming involved with Eigen. I'm an experienced c++ developer with OpenCL experience gained from developing my own neural nets and linear algebra library. I'd love to help with this effort and get started developing with SYCL.

I'm an experienced c++ developer with OpenCL experience gained from developing my own neural nets and linear algebra library. I'd love to help with this effort and get started developing with SYCL.
body: @lukeiwanski SYCL seems like the right way to go given the amount of template metaprogramming involved with Eigen. I'm an experienced c++ developer with OpenCL experience gained from developing my own [neural nets and linear algebra library](https://github.com/ville-k/vinn). I'd love to help with this effort and get started developing with SYCL.
